subject: For your Sunset Rituals — RAV Vast + Live Looping Act
body:
Hi Scorpios team,

I watched your sunset rituals — that's exactly what I do at Relais Villa Porta (Lake Maggiore, 4 years resident).

The format: RAV Vast (steel tongue drum) + percussive guitar + vocals + Ableton. Starts meditative, builds to organic house. 60-90 min sunset-to-night journey.

Credentials: Greece's Got Talent (4 yes votes), Villa Porta resident since 2022.

Here's my sunset set style: youtu.be/K7oROUjuLGQ (RAV + live looping)

Open to a trial set or off-peak slot for 2026?

Alessio "Flutur"
linktr.ee/flutur
videoUsed: Rocca di Arona - sunset live looping

subject: Ethnic-acoustic live act for your sunset rituals — Flutur
body:
Hi Alemagou team,

Your bohemian-ethnic vibe is my sound — acoustic instruments building to organic house.

What I do: RAV Vast + percussive guitar + vocals + live-looping. Perfect for sunsets that evolve into nighttime rituals.

Background: 4-year resident at Relais Villa Porta (Lake Maggiore). Greece's Got Talent (4 yes votes).

Here's my sound: youtu.be/K7oROUjuLGQ (RAV + live looping evocativo)

Interested in 2026?

Alessio "Flutur"

subject: Live acoustic-electronic act for Nammos — Flutur
body:
Hi Nammos team,

Your live shows set the standard. I'd like to add something different.

My set: RAV Vast (steel tongue drum) + percussive guitar + vocals + Ableton. Elegant acoustic sounds building to melodic house.

Background: 4-year resident at Relais Villa Porta (4-star, Lake Maggiore). Greece's Got Talent (4 yes votes).

Here's a deep house clip: youtu.be/FkBwJJS2ZxQ (Ben Böhmer style)

Worth a conversation for 2026?

Alessio "Flutur"

subject: RAV Vast sound healing + sunset concerts — collaboration proposal
body:
Hi Kea Retreat team,

Your sound baths and full moon rituals are exactly what I specialize in — but with live instruments.

What I offer:
• RAV Vast sound healing sessions
• Sunset meditation concerts
• Sound & vibration workshops

Background: 4 years doing sunset meditation programming at Relais Villa Porta. Also develop software for vibroacoustic therapy optimization.

Here's my RAV meditation style: youtu.be/I-lpfRHTSG4 (Efthymia - RAV solo)

Open to explore a collaboration?

Alessio "Flutur"
linktr.ee/flutur

subject: Vibroacoustic therapy + RAV Vast — collaboration proposal
body:
Hi Euphoria team,

Your integrative approach — ancient therapies, cutting-edge science — aligns with my practice.

What I offer:
• RAV Vast vibroacoustic sessions (I also develop software for vibroacoustic therapy optimization)
• Sunset meditation concerts
• Sound frequency workshops

Background: 4-year resident at Relais Villa Porta. 121 GitHub repos including projects in vibroacoustic therapy algorithms.

Here's my meditative RAV style: youtu.be/I-lpfRHTSG4 (Efthymia)

Worth a conversation?

Alessio "Flutur"
linktr.ee/flutur
